response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and aspirations, is worth $1,500,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $1,400,000, which represents a significant saving compared to its true worth. I am confident that this investment will not only fulfill your current requirements but also provide substantial returns in the future. I look forward to discussing the details and exploring how we can make this transaction beneficial for both of us. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this exceptional opportunity.", "product_price": 1400000}
